product_name: Seattle Sports E-Merse DryMax eReader Waterproof Case - 2014 Overstock
long_description: The Seattle Sports E-Merse DryMax eReader Case lets you read and listen to movies right through the waterproof barrier. It is sized to fit Kindle, Kindle Fire, Nook and other 7-in. tablets.
short_description: The Seattle Sports E-Merse DryMax eReader Case lets you read and listen to movies right through the waterproof barrier. It is sized to fit Kindle, Kindle Fire, Nook and other 7-in. tablets.
